java.com.mjhutchinson.cansatgroundstationtoolkit.serial

Class SerialCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.com.mjhutchinson.cansatgroundstationtoolkit.serial.SerialCommunicator

  • public class SerialCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Michael Hutchinson on 29/10/2014 at 22:07. A class to handle serial communications over a specified port. Events are posted using a guava event bus.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  SerialCommunicator.SerialPortListener
      The listener which waits for serial data on the currently open port and handles the data which comes over the port
      (package private) static class  SerialCommunicator.ShutdownListener
      A shutdown listener to close the currently open port if one is open to prevent it being locked open after the program terminates

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialCommunicator

        public SerialCommunicator()
        Instantiates a new serial communications module. Adds a shutdown hook in order to close port communications when the program shuts down in order that no ports are left locked open. Instantiates a new guava event bus to handler all the serial data events.

    • Method Detail

      • openPort

        public boolean openPort(java.lang.String portName,
                        int baudRate)
        Opens a new port with the specified parameters. After every new line character a new SerialDataEvent or SerialMessageEvent is posted to the serialEventBus.
        Parameters:
        portName - the system String name of the port to be opened
        baudRate - the Baud rate at which the port is to be opened at
        Returns:
        returns true if the port has been successfully opened, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        SerialDataHandler, SerialMessageEvent

      • closePort

        public void closePort()
        Closes the port currently open. Dose nothing if no port is open.

      • writeSerial

        public void writeSerial(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to the serial port.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent.

      • changePortParams

        public void changePortParams(int baudRate)
        Change the parameters of the currently selected port. Dose nothing of no port is selected.
        Parameters:
        baudRate - the new Baud rate at which the port should communicate.

      • getPorts

        public java.lang.String[] getPorts()
        Returns a String array of the available ports system names.
        Returns:
        the array of names of the ports

      • serialRegister

        public void serialRegister(java.lang.Object registree)
        Adds an object to the guava event bus's object registry
        Parameters:
        registree - the object to register

      • serialUnregister

        public void serialUnregister(java.lang.Object unregistree)
        Removes an object from the guava event bus's object registry
        Parameters:
        unregistree - the object to remove

      • getSerialEventBus

        public static com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus getSerialEventBus()
        Returns:
        returns the guava event bus used to handler serial communications.
